def_en: Someone who speaks with a particular accent pronounces the words of a language in a distinctive way that shows which country, region, or social class they come from.

def_cn: （某些语言中标在字母上方的）变音符号
def_en: An accent is a short line or other mark which is written above certain letters in some languages and which indicates the way those letters are pronounced.
If you put the accent on a particular feature of something, you emphasize it or give it special importance.
